entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILC doesn't return an error -- docker build keeps on running #89332
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in config binder generator #89322
    8.0.0
  • Create an internal sorted equatable collection type for incremental source generators #89318
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should provide an info message when the managed signature returns an int, enum, or type alias for int #89315
    8.0.0
  • ComInterfaceGenerator Docs should be very clear about how return values / HResult on the managed method translates to the native signature #89314
    8.0.0
  • Calling TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes too many times leads to StackOverflowException #89313
  • logging JsonConsole default option #89306
    Future
  • [wasm] SIMD cannot be disabled #89302
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient - Kerberos authentication fails after a redirect #89300
    9.0.0
  • IsolatedStorageFile.GetMachineStoreForApplication() not working on MacOS #89298
  • APPLICATION_HANG_cfffffff_coreclr.dll!Thread::DoAppropriateWaitWorker #89297
  • .NET 8 locals/stack memory alignment or "zeroing" behavior change? #89295
  • Stack buffer overrun stack cookie check leading to crash in .net6.0 application #89309
  • Unable to break on callback from unmanaged thread #89292
  • [NativeAOT] Test failure in Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Tests #89286
    8.0.0
  • createdump is not being signed #89285
  • Cannot read appsettings.json if you used Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools 8.0-preview #89284
    8.0.0
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting #89283
  • Improve System.IO.Pipelines debugging #89281

Closed

  • [EnC] CoreCLR assertion in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdateTest.TestGenericAddStaticField #87574
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] helix/windows tests issues tracking issue #52138
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Figure out how to handle APIs not supported on AOT #53825
    8.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] JIT.HardwareIntrinsics Vector256/Vector128 test failures #54122
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][HTTP] TypeError: Failed to execute 'fetch' on 'Window': Request with GET/HEAD method cannot have body #53591
    8.0.0
  • Wasm libraries tests build requires an external jsvu install #42414
    8.0.0
  • Microbenchmark System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BitOperations.PopCount_ulongis 464 % slower on Wasm #41454
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] SIMD support tracking issue #51709
    8.0.0
  • Browser compat: TaskFactory type using not supported API #44544
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][tests][eat] System.Linq.Tests.TrimCompatibilityTests.QueryableMethodsContainCorrectDynamicDependency #50712
    Future
  • [wasm][tests] NullReferenceException errors in `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` #51708
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][tests][eat] System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.NoExceptionThrownWhenProcessingStaticActivityProperties #50711
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] resolve llvm versioning in AOT toolchain #49644
    8.0.0
  • Browser compat: Stream class using unsupported API #44543
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] WASM Linux failure in DllImportSearchPathsTest: parameter 'path1' value is null #84724
  • [release/7.0-staging] Wasm builds breaking with trimming - `error IL2040: FSharp.Core: Could not find embedded resource 'FSharpSignatureCompressedData.FSharp.Core' to remove in assembly 'FSharp.Core'` #86916
  • Blazor WebAssembly -AOT - NET 7 Release candidate 2 #76992
  • Open terminal/bash/console/cmd on macOS/linux using ProcessStartInfo and RedirectStandardOutput/Error #87172
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regressions in System.Collections.Sort<IntStruct> #89106
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress] GC hole in libraries test with JitStress=2 #88168
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Audit `GetAllSuccs`/`GetEHSuccs` when filters are involved #86538
    8.0.0
  • Developers can safely trim apps which need Configuration Binder #44493
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBuilder - Configuration.Json: Binding a Dictionary<string,string> error when Key contains an string url like http://www.google.es #42643
    8.0.0
  • Cannot create instance of type 'X' because parameter 'XParameter' has no matching config. Each parameter in the constructor that does not have a default value must have a corresponding config entry. #77660
    8.0.0
  • Support all applicable ConfigurationBinder method overloads in binding generator #83600
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 9 Regressions on 2/14/2023 11:18:21 PM #82540
  • [API Proposal]: IRandom interface (which System.Random and Cryptography.RandomNumberGenerator implement) #82799
  • Configuration binding source generator throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException on macOS and Linux #89014
    8.0.0
  • Memory Leak in MulticastDelegate #84709
  • [API Proposal]: Add span based apis for Array.CreateInstance/GetValue/SetValue #81826
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Decimal on 2/17/2023 #82440
  • Need _udiv128 intrinsic as a .Net API, eg, Math.BigDivRem. #81337
  • `System.Action` assignable to `System.Action<>` #84061
  • string.Join with first element null status #86823
  • System.Array.Copy() getting slow in background on Windows 11 #88407
  • Avoid emitting code that honors BinderOptions when not specified in binding call #88110
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interface for Exceptions that have child/aggregate Exceptions #87625
  • System.Numerics.Tensors is missing API documentation #87710
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Garbage HRESULT Returned without PreserveSig #89276
  • Json source generator does not produce a valid diagnostic for JsonConverterAttribute subtype with no constructor parameters #88638
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Test failures in System.Net.Http.Json.Unit.Tests #89195
    8.0.0
  • Android crash when using AOT+LLVM #79910
    7.0.x
  • Remove libraries folders that don't have src/*.cs files #78978
    Future
  • WASM build broken on main #81136
  • Allow JsonConsoleFormatter to write in compact format #39917
    Future
  • System.Security.Claims.Claim Value should support any data type #82613
    Future
  • Consider replacing custom config binding logic in console logging with use of binding source generator #83598
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89245
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Numerics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89246
    8.0.0
  • [AOT] System.NotSupportedException: The type 'System.Collections.Generic.List`1[System.String]' is not supported #89288
  • Failed to AOT compile Microsoft.Graph.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #87061
    8.0.0
  • `Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree` can use `RegDeleteTreeW` #82586
    Future
  • LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests crashed in CI #87951

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][wasm] Use [UnmanagedCallersOnly] in GetDelegateForFunctionPoin… #89334
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Check for dotnet.dll when enumerating SDK paths #89333
    area-Host
  • [NativeAOT] Replace GVMLookupForSlot internal cache with generic cache similar to CastCache #89331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use AVX512 intrinsics for number conversion when possible #89330
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Ownership tracking #89329
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make checks for compiler-generated types more specific #89327
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • FIX #87983 - Enable events for LogAlways #89326
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix exe size for Mach-O files #89325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid BYREF trees in ByteOffset #89324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2227182 #89321
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable configuration FunctionalTests.ArrayTests.DifferentConfigSources_Merged_* tests on ios/tvos #89319
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Hide IntrospectionExtensions.GetTypeInfo #89317
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Is this all I need to do? #89316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Refactor System.Linq.Expressions feature switches #89308
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger]Adding more information about the array type #89304
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete NativeAOT_StaticInitialization #89291
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • preserve TargetHostName even if we do not send it out via SNI #89289
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Add a workaround for #89191 #89287
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't always do optimistic HW intrinsic expansion #89282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix TestGenericAddStaticField #89145
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Upstream some changes to portable allocation helpers #89269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Block inlining of IntroSort #89310
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Fix handling of filter successors #89275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Fix perf scenario tool build failures #89323
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove etw --exclude-feature tests. #89107
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix System.Net.Http.Json tests in AOT #89307
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Emit a diagnostic when attributes deriving from JsonConverterAttribute are being used. #89199
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Move full facade assemblies into src/libraries/shims #89184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range initialization, take 2 #87992
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Optimize MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable for arrays and strings #89274
    area-System.Memory
  • [wasm] Add index of string span measurement #89294
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove feature exclude xml tests #89111
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix GetArgLoc #88657
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Virt call unsafe accessor tests #89220
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Jiterpreter thread safety infrastructure #88279
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Implement new streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #89258
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [Mono][WIP] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Move the IsLeft/IsRight decision out of the loop and use computed substring set #88516
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fixes for outerloop-mono.yml #88743
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][globalization] `HybridGlobalization` remove code conditionally for `WasmBuildNative` #87170
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Struct copies have unexpectedly bad CQ #2351

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add retries to the NodeJS download task #2349

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Delete the no-longer-needed casts in `cpobj` code #2352
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
    area-ManagedZLib
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add retrying to the NodeJS download #2350
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more efficient null-checking and use inbounds GEPs #2348
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • MSBuildSdkResolver fails to resolve Microsoft.NET.Sdk, ... System.Collections.Immutable, Version=5.0.0.0 #34182
  • Add support for RazorLangVersion 8 #31058

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Certificate trust list needs to be backported to 6.0.3xx (and maybe 6.0.1xx) #33928
    Discussion
  • Native AOT doesn't work with Windows Forms #34129
  • Missing ASP.NET Core Runtime prompt does not download ASP.NET Core, but .NET Desktop instead #33793
  • dotnet format 7.0.304 fails when resolving types from COM references #33260
  • .NET Native Library Packaging (RuntimeIdentifiers, build, testing, VS etc.) #33845
  • Error NETSDK1004 occurs when building any C++/CLI project. #31683
    Discussion
  • Globalization invariant mode not working on Linux with .NET 8 Preview 6 native AOT #34091

PullRequests

Created

  • Configurable wwwroot for StaticWebAssets #34178
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Parse User and Port Container Metadata from special environment variables #34154
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Move `GenerateRuntimeConfigurationFiles=false` back to Blazor SDK from Wasm SDK #34177
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Disable ConfigurationBinder source generator in Blazor WASM #34142
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Include Mac in AOT testing #34130
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs to 6.0.4 #34143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs to 6.0.4 #34144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #34051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposed change to method group natural type #7364

PullRequests

Created

  • fix links to spec #7368
  • `modreq(In)` is not emitted for `in` parameters of delegate `Invoke` #7366

Merged

  • Clarify "movable" property of inline array elements #7362
  • Add topic for "method group natural type" #7365

Updated

  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350
  • Define capture behavior when primary ctor bypassed #7354

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • autocomplete trashing variable names #69154
  • IDE C# "quick action" code generation deletes semicolon after block #69153
  • AnalyzeDataFlow reports captured primary ctor parameters in lambdas that do not capture any #69152
  • ref struct: uninitialized ref field and no way to initialize it. #69151
  • Building with a dotnet not on the PATH is broken #69150
  • ref struct with ref field #69148
  • Suppress IDE0044/IDE0051 for [InlineArray] types #69143
  • "error CS9027: Unexpected keyword 'unchecked'" is reported for cref syntax #69142
  • Clarify Interceptors documentation #69140
  • Rename tracking crashes if the symbol disappears after the session is started #69139

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33921.318 #69157
  • C# Dev Kit complains about incomplete ref struct syntax #68742
    GA

PullRequests

Created

  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Switch way from IVsService in option persister creation #69156
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue where we were trimming the semicolon errantly from a class when doing override completion #69155
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • C# EE: Fix parameter index #69149
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Misc minor syntax API improvements #69147
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove newly documented rules from list #69145
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for language incompatible [InlineArray] types #69144
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Avoid allocating when comparing tokens #69146
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Localize the output of run tests #69121
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable test codelens when devkit is enabled #69119
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warning for extension method receiver #69083
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Remove tracking link to issue 44902 #69095
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Honor Concord's TruncatedString flag to reduce memory usage #68969
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet test SDK resolution when server starts as dll #69120
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable bootstrapped builds #69130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Localize C# Interactive window title #69066
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Enable Binskim scan in CI builds #69081
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deterministically resolve the "auto" render mode to "server" or "webassembly" #49580
    8.0-rc1
  • App styles bundle not found when running the app locally using the Production environment #49577
  • Using Blazor for the error handling results in "no submit handler was found with that name" error when dealing with post requests #49576
  • TagHelpers don't render content in .NET7 #49574
  • Incorrect placement of identifiers #49573
  • Developer exception page renders as plain text in Blazor Web App when doing an enhanced navigation #49571
  • BWA/WASM templates embrace H1 top-level headers but RC template doesn't #49570
  • Localised decimal type value cannot be set on input type number #49564
  • Please consider creating self-contained installed bundles #49562

Closed

  • WebApiAot project template ApiApplication words not updated #49529
  • SignalR working even with API down WFT????? #49453
  • Auto switching for interactive components #46397
    8.0-preview7
  • How to get http request headers accept value? #49535
  • macOS uses port 5000 #48932

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations from route matching #49579
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2227027 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • WebApiAot project template WebApplication1 instead of ApiApplication1 #49563
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49578
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49477
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49559
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, 8.0-preview7
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49541
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-rc1
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49542
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview7
  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49557
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cc36671` to `1ed6a8c` #49568
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr
  • Reduce record usage in published projects #48907
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49498
    area-identity
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    area-hosting
  • Remove stack overflow in EndpointFilterInvocationContexts #49285
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread #48991
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0
  • [hotreload] Change file encode #49247
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • fix: Account for form attribute on checkbox tag input helper #49201 #49323
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Return LockedOut result from TwoFactorSignInAsync after a failed call #49337
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Move to MacOS 13 #49367
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Support NO_PROXY": "localhost" in launchSettings.json #49395
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Remove array allocations routing in common cases #49539
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet dump analyze's `gcroot -all <address>` crashes on arm64 #3726
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add default iOS/Android commands to dotnet-dsrouter. #4090

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #3889
  • Extend dotnet-gcdump support for mobile and dotnet-dsrouter scenarios. #4081

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchHandler Keyboard does not dismiss on ItemSelection / Navigation (Android) #16298
  • SearchHandler crashes on ItemSource change in iOS #16297
  • [.NET 8 Preview 6] Static extension can't resolve nested class references from class libraries #16293
  • Only releases with status draft may be created on draft app. #16291
  • Picker control implementation using Android Spinner view #16288
  • Tooltip hover area not cover all the Label #16286
  • Button click event not fire in some area #16285
  • On Android, a `Picker` is replaced by views without id when opening it #16284
  • Picker control does not properly emit `SemanticProperties.Description` as `content-desc` on Android #16282
  • The ScrollView Orientation="Both" is not working properly #16280
  • Error JAVAC0000 error: no suitable constructor found for BaseCellView(Context,AttributeSet,int,int) #16278
  • Dynamic resources are not applied issue for the layouts in .NET MAUI #16277
    Backlog
  • A double click (only clicked event defined) on a MenuFlyoutItem adds multiple pages #16276
    Backlog
  • Android: Cannot deploy & debug on physical device (Android 12) with VS4Mac #16274
  • DatePicker FontAttributes="Bold" and FontAttributes="Italic" Not Working on IOS or MacCatalyst #16272

Closed

  • Label with bound BackgroundColor does not work on Android #16220
  • BackgroundColor of a Label doesn't work in Release on iOS #16250
  • Custom commands are not invoked for some controls #16268
    Backlog
  • overscroll stretching in Android 12 BlazorMaui #16239
  • Label wordwrap does not honor container MaxWidth #15785
    Backlog
  • Cannot swipe on Windows (with mouse) #6152
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Cannot swipe on Windows (mouse or touch) #16287
  • Cannot target older versions of IOS #16279
  • Rework LogicalChildren on Element to better represent visual vs logical children #11528
    Backlog
  • Android Emulator UTF8 Binding and Accent Support [Localization] #10723
    Backlog
  • Unable to change color of BackButton icon in Shell #11127
    Backlog
  • iOS - Can't scroll to the last item in Flyout #15153

PullRequests

Created

  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓
  • Add ViewHandler Mapper docs #16296
  • Add hooks to disconnect/connect handler where developers can easily wire up handlers #16292
  • Added Device ID to Essentials.DeviceInfo #16290
    community ✨
  • Revert "Style specificity (#13818)" #16283
  • Fix issue with ListView not firing SelectedItemChanged #16275

Merged

  • Fix default constructors for many control handlers #16270
    community ✨
  • Windows apps should be --self-contained #16289
  • [Bug] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16215
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Add a Mac Catalyst device test run #16260
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16271
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Improve the names of the test files/runs #16262
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
    area/controls 🎮
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix infinite recursion error in CommandMapper.Add() #16264
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    memory-leak 💦
  • [net7.0] Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #15652
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting a default value to a binary field causes an "everlasting" migration #31330

Closed

  • .Contains() on a simple List<T> within a LINQ query Where clause results in Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Incorrect syntax near '$'.' #31323
  • Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #30922
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix NativeAOT warnings in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #31328
  • More changes from API review #31324
    auto-merge
  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.1 #31286
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • Translate generic math calls using the existing Math translators #31322
  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289
